text:
Problem 3.4

The Integer Product Game: Applying Multiplication and Division

We have developed algorithms for adding, subtracting, multiplying, and dividing integers. In the Number Connections unit, we played games called the Factor Game and the Product Game using whole numbers. Mr. Bernoskiâ€™s class creates a similar game for family game night, called the Integer Product Game. In this game, you can use your multiplication and division algorithms.
